overview: Four women are followed in their day to day: an agriculturist, an agronomist judge, a forager and a worker in the process of fruit handling. Four very different profiles, women who perform business functions as well as technical or handling ones, and who are a small part of the functioning of the gigantic industry of red berries in Huelva, which is fundamental to the zone's economy. As a result of this intense following we know the personal story of each of our main chararcters, their visions of the world, what they deal with on a daily basis in their job and what it is like to be a women in the agricultural world, which traditionally, and to this day, is mostly controlled by men.
tagline: A documentary on the role of women in agriculture
title: La venus de las colmenas
